== Procurement Notice ==

### Solicitation Number
WS4207262536

### Title
F1782-24C001 CCGS J.P. Tully – Alongside Refit

### Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Closing Date
31 October 2023, at 14:00:00 eastern time

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, invites you to submit a proposal for the alongside refit of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship CCGS John P Tully.

### Contract Details
- **Contract Start Date**: October 31, 2023
- **Contract End Date**: April 16, 2025
- **Location**: Institute of Ocean Sciences, Sidney, British Columbia

### Required Work
The contractor will be responsible for carrying out the alongside refit of the CCGS John P Tully, as per the Technical Specifications detailed in the Statement of Work.

### Selection Criteria
- **Competitive Pricing**: The proposal with the lowest price will be selected.

### Required Documents
- A completed Proposal form
- A detailed breakdown of costs
- Assurances that the contractor meets all requirements

### Submission Requirements
- Proposals must be submitted electronically
- Deadline for submission: October 31, 2023, at 14:00:00 eastern time

### Contact
For any questions or concerns regarding this procurement, please contact:

- email: [eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Log into an existing account or register a new account on the eSourcing Platform:
